product_name: Jelloskin Massage Cream for face & body 200ml
description:
Description


Drawing inspiration from Hanbang's principle that a balanced mind and body are key to well-being, we created the JELLOSKIN Massage Cream. This cream is designed not just to refine facial contours but to soothe and release the physical and mental tensions through therapeutic massage.

For an elevated experience, pair this cream with a gwalsa(gua sha), a traditional massage tool, enhancing its smoothing and soothing effects. Its gentle formula is perfect for the entire face and body, crafted with ingredients known for their calming benefits.

- Top to Toe Massage Cream
This body cream can work as a massage cream as well as a hydrating cream at the same time as its texture glides on smoothly without friction. It has been developed to reduce skin irritation and can be used comfortably all over the face and body.

- Firm yet moisturizing feeling
The firm cream glides effortlessly on the skin without stickiness. It contains ingredients that help moisturize and protect the skin's barrier, including Centiger bean extract, for a supple, subtle glow of moisture on the skin.

- Texture
A creamy formulation with a pudding-like texture. It offers a smooth rolling sensation for an effective massage experience without friction or irritation.
 
Key Ingredients
Centiger Bean
Tiger beans, rich in isoflavones, saponins, and proteins, are known for their skin-moisturizing and irritation-preventing properties. To further enhance these advantages, we germinate these tiger beans using Centella asiatica extract to create Centiger beans. Centiger beans offer higher barrier care benefits for healthier and more vibrant skin.

Rice Bran Oil
Since ancient times, rice bran oil has been used for face massaging and hair treatments. Abundant in nutrients such as vitamins A, B1, B6, iron, and minerals, it deeply moisturizes the skin and promotes a luminous complexion.

reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
reviews.content: This cream is great for dry sensitive skin. It worked really well on my eczema-prone skin and did not sting at all. However, I do find that I have to mix this with an oil or another thick moisturiser for it to fully moisturise my extremely dry skin. Nonetheless, a fantastic no-fuss moisturiser that is suitable for use on both the face and body :)
